name: Dinopixel Drawing
summary: A DINO file is a drawing created by Dinopixel, an online pixel art maker. It contains information about the drawing, such as the canvas dimensions, pencil strokes, and colors, in the Dinopixel (DINO) format. Users save drawings as DINO files to preserve their progress (downloading them to their computer), then upload them back into the Dinopixel program in the web browser to continue editing them.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
